_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)

_a-0000edc1-5343-8000-9e09-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CRD_clauses_kpi

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_userLinkDisplay
_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
  text: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!username),
    ri!valueIfNull,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_displayGroupOrUser(groupOrUser: ri!username)
  ),
  linkStyle: "STANDALONE",
  link: if(
    and(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!username),
      isusernametaken(ri!username)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_userRecordLink"(
      label: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayGroupOrUser(groupOrUser: ri!username),
      user: touser(ri!username)
    ),
    null
  )
)

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_left

_a-0000e615-fd0f-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QR_getRefClause

_a-0000eb16-753f-8000-9d01-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CP_recordActionField
_a-0000eb16-753f-8000-9d01-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordActionField_v1"(
  actions: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!actions,
    expression: rule!AS_GCM_CP_recordActionItem(
      action: fv!item,
      identifier: ri!identifier
    )
  ),
  style: ri!style,
  display: ri!display,
  openActionsIn: ri!openActionsIn,
  align: ri!align,
  accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
  showWhen: ri!showWhen,
  securityOnDemand: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!securityOnDemand,
    /* By default setting the value to false when the automation toggle is turned on as the Fitnesse doesn't support this feature yet. */
    default: and(
      cons!AS_GCM_BOL_RECORD_ACTION_SECURITY_ON_DEMAND_TOGGLE,
      not(
        cons!AS_GCM_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED
      ),
      contains({ "MENU", "MENU_ICON" }, ri!style)
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e61a-f20f-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_displayUser

_a-0000e447-933d-8000-9baa-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QNM_REF_questionTypes

_a-0000e615-fd0f-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CPS_landingPage

_a-0000e447-933d-8000-9baa-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_formatDate

_a-0000e61a-f20f-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel

_a-0000e615-fd0f-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QNM_CPS_viewQuestionBank
_a-0000e615-fd0f-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!triggerRefresh: a!refreshVariable(
    value: now(),
    refreshAfter: "RECORD_ACTION",
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!refreshOnVarChange
  ),
  rule!AS_GCM_QNM_GRD_questionsForQuestionBank(
    bundle: ri!bundle,
    triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh
  )
)

_a-0000e994-0db4-8000-9c52-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CP_recordActionItem

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_queryEntity

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_displayGroupOrUser

_a-0000e615-fd0f-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_DSP_clauseRecordTitle

_a-0000e447-933d-8000-9baa-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QNM_QR_getQuestionnaire_Template

_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_getAndDisplayLabelSingle
_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  a!localVariables(
  
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(
      bundleKey: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    
    local!i18nData: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(
      bundleFolder: ri!bundleFolder,
      bundleNames: local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName,
      localeAgnostic: ri!localeAgnostic
    ),
    
    rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
      i18nData: local!i18nData,
      bundleKey: ri!bundleKey,
      arguments: ri!arguments
    )
  )
)

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_DPL_CO_UT_isUserMemberOfGroups
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
  #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:isusermemberofgroup?okey=a!isUserMemberOfGroup"(
    username: a!defaultValue(value: ri!user, default: loggedInUser()),
    groups: ri!groups,
    matchAllGroups: ri!matchAllGroups
  )
)

_a-0000e63a-a5cb-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_GRD_clauseSetsGrid
_a-0000e63a-a5cb-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!isClauseReportingView: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!clauseId),
  local!logicalExpForClauseSetQuery: a!match(
    value: rule!AS_CO_UT_isUserMemberOfGroups(
      groups: cons!AS_GAM_GRP_CONTRACTING_MANAGER,
      user: loggedInUser()
    ),
    whenTrue: local!isClauseReportingView,
    then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
      operator: "AND_ALL",
      filters: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.clauses.clauseId,
          operator: "=",
          value: ri!clauseId
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.clauses.isActive,
          operator: "=",
          value: true
        )
      }
    ),
    whenTrue: or(fv!value, ri!isAllClauseSets = true),
    then: {},
    default: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
      operator: "OR",
      filters: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.contractingOfficer,
          operator: "=",
          value: loggedInUser()
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.contractSpecialist,
          operator: "=",
          value: loggedInUser()
        )
      }
    )
  ),
  local!latestGeneratingClauseSet: a!refreshVariable(
    value: rule!AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetDetails(
      useQueryRecord: true,
      additionalFilters: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.refStatusId,
          operator: "=",
          value: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CLAUSE_SET_STATUS_GENERATING
        )
      },
      logicalExpression: local!logicalExpForClauseSetQuery,
      returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT,
      sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
        field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.modifiedDatetime,
        ascending: false
      ),
      executeWhen: true
    ),
    refreshAfter: "RECORD_ACTION",
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridField_v3"(
    label: if(
      local!isClauseReportingView,
      "",
      ""
    ),
    labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
    emptyGridMessage: if(
      or(
        ri!isAllClauseSets = true,
        local!isClauseReportingView
      ),
      "No clause sets available",
      ""
    ),
    data: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordData"(
      recordType: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set,
      filters: local!logicalExpForClauseSetQuery
    ),
    columns: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
        label: "",
        sortField: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.formattedTitle,
        value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
          value: {
            rule!AS_GCM_CO_DSP_primaryRecordListField(
              recordTitle: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.formattedTitle],
              recordType: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set,
              recordIdentifier: fv!identifier
            ),
            char(10),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
                bundle: ri!bundle,
                bundleKey: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.refType.refKey]
              ),
              color: rule!AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName(colorName: "GRAY_3")
            )
          }
        ),
        align: "START",
        width: "AUTO"
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
        label: "",
        sortField: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.refStatus.refLabel,
        value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_tagField"(
          tags: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_tagItem_v1"(
            text: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
              bundle: ri!bundle,
              bundleKey: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.refStatus.refKey]
            ),
            backgroundColor: rule!AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName(
              fv!row[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.refStatus.backgroundColor]
            ),
            textColor: rule!AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName(
              fv!row[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.refStatus.refColor]
            )
          )
        ),
        align: "START",
        width: "NARROW"
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
        label: "Contract Type",
        value: a!defaultValue(
          value: joinarray(
            a!flatten(
              index(
                rule!AS_CO_UT_indexWhere(
                  value: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.setId],
                  initialArray: ri!allclauseSetContractTypeMaps.setId,
                  finalArray: ri!allclauseSetContractTypeMaps.contractType
                ),
                "contractCode",
                {}
              )
            ),
            ", "
          ),
          default: "-"
        ),
        align: "START",
        width: "NARROW_PLUS"
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
        label: "Codes",
        value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
          labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
          value: {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: concat(
                "PSC",
                ": "
              ),
              style: "STRONG"
            ),
            a!defaultValue(
              value: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.pscCode],
              default: "-"
            ),
            char(10),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: concat(
                "NAICS",
                ": "
              ),
              style: "STRONG"
            ),
            a!defaultValue(
              value: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.naicsCode],
              default: "-"
            )
          }
        )
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
        label: "Dollar Amount",
        sortField: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.estimatedDollarAmt,
        value: rule!AS_GCM_DPL_CO_UT_formatCurrencyValue(
          currencyValue: todecimal(
            fv!row[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.estimatedDollarAmt]
          ),
          currencyCode: cons!AS_CO_TXT_DEFAULT_CURRENCY_CODE,
          showDecimal: true(),
          showHyphen: true()
        ),
        align: "END"
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
        label: "CO/CS",
        value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
          labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
          value: {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: concat(
                "CO",
                ": "
              ),
              style: "STRONG"
            ),
            rule!AS_CO_UT_displayUser(
              user: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.contractingOfficer],
              showHyphenIfValueNull: true
            ),
            char(10),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: concat(
                "CS",
                ": "
              ),
              style: "STRONG"
            ),
            rule!AS_CO_UT_displayUser(
              user: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.contractSpecialist],
              showHyphenIfValueNull: true
            )
          }
        )
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
        label: "",
        sortField: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.modifiedDatetime,
        value: rule!AS_CO_UT_formatDateTime(
          dateTime: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.modifiedDatetime]
        ),
        align: "END",
        width: "NARROW_PLUS"
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
        value: rule!AS_GCM_CP_recordActionField(
          actions: {
            #"urn:appian:record-action:v1:474117cd-fb9d-413e-9656-09e5f8bd3f06/0ec7fcf2-19a9-42f3-8275-939107a9c66c",
            #"urn:appian:record-action:v1:474117cd-fb9d-413e-9656-09e5f8bd3f06/ab67ee21-86ba-4bd0-aa0c-8e6cc9a3e7b8"
          },
          style: "MENU_ICON",
          display: "LABEL",
          identifier: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.setId]
        ),
        align: "END",
        width: "ICON",
        showWhen: not(local!isClauseReportingView)
      )
    },
    pageSize: if(local!isClauseReportingView,cons!AS_CO_ENUM_PAGE_SIZE_MEDIUM,cons!AS_CO_ENUM_PAGE_SIZE_MEDIUM_LARGE),
    initialSorts: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
      field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.modifiedDatetime,
      ascending: false()
    ),
    pagingSaveInto: fv!pagingInfo,
    validations: {},
    borderStyle: "LIGHT",
    shadeAlternateRows: false(),
    rowHeader: 1,
    /* Grid will not be refreshed if there are no clause sets generating or the time limit has exceeded. */
    refreshInterval: if(
      and(
        not(local!isClauseReportingView),
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(local!latestGeneratingClauseSet),
        now() < a!addDateTime(
          startDateTime: index(
            local!latestGeneratingClauseSet,
            recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.modifiedDatetime,
            null
          ),
          minutes: cons!AS_GCM_INT_CLAUSE_SET_GRID_AUTO_REFRESH_TIME_OUT_MINUTES
        )
      ),
      0.5,
      null
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh,
    refreshAfter: "RECORD_ACTION",
    userFilters: {
      #"urn:appian:user-filter:v1:474117cd-fb9d-413e-9656-09e5f8bd3f06/072d36cf-ecbd-4412-b60d-68209a74c6e4",
      #"urn:appian:user-filter:v1:474117cd-fb9d-413e-9656-09e5f8bd3f06/a9fe0655-ad64-49c5-ae8b-0975b9a327a3",
      if(
        local!isClauseReportingView,
        #"urn:appian:user-filter:v1:474117cd-fb9d-413e-9656-09e5f8bd3f06/bea61626-61d1-4417-8481-0259c6f0db4b",
        {
          #"urn:appian:user-filter:v1:474117cd-fb9d-413e-9656-09e5f8bd3f06/7767dec4-2d0f-4209-885b-7b04685497d7",
          #"urn:appian:user-filter:v1:474117cd-fb9d-413e-9656-09e5f8bd3f06/a04580ba-7f16-4299-bfc0-c3d381703dcd",
          #"urn:appian:user-filter:v1:474117cd-fb9d-413e-9656-09e5f8bd3f06/40ca5972-1954-4380-b18e-5b24e1746c4b"
        }
      ),
      #"urn:appian:user-filter:v1:474117cd-fb9d-413e-9656-09e5f8bd3f06/57df4238-ccd5-4cea-b304-2ceb73098015",

    },
    showSearchBox: true,
    showRefreshButton: not(local!isClauseReportingView),
    showExportButton: true
  )
)

_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QNM_CPS_rulesForClauseset

_a-0000eacc-9cb6-8000-9cdb-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GAM_getRecordActionVisibility

_a-0000e63a-a5cb-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_GRD_templatesGrid
_a-0000e63a-a5cb-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GCM_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_formLayout_v1"(
    label: "",
    contents: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridField_v3"(
      label: "",
      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
      data: recordType!AS GCM R Template,
      rowHeader: 2,
      columns: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          value: rule!AS_GCM_displayStatusColumn(
            status: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM R Template.isActive],
            bundle: local!bundle
          ),
          width: "ICON"
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          label: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
            bundle: local!bundle,
            bundleKey: "lbl_Template",

          ),
          sortField: recordType!AS GCM R Template.templateName,
          value: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM R Template.templateName],
          align: "START"
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          label: "",
          sortField: recordType!AS GCM R Template.templateDescription,
          value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
            value: rule!AS_GAM_displayPlaceholderForNullValues(
              input: rule!AS_GAM_UT_showMoreOrShowLessText(
                text: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM R Template.templateDescription],
                shortenToLen: cons!AS_GCM_TEXT_LENGTH_FOR_TEMPLATE_DESC_IN_TEMPLATE_GRID
              )
            )
          ),
          align: "START"
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          label: "",
          sortField: recordType!AS GCM R Template.modifiedDatetime,
          value: rule!AS_CO_UT_formatDateTime(
            dateTime: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM R Template.modifiedDatetime]
          ),
          align: "END"
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          label: "",
          value: rule!AS_GCM_CP_recordActionField(
            actions: {
              #"urn:appian:record-action:v1:58275e5f-625f-4d0b-9b27-58f09b63e138/e9e242fd-3bce-43f4-bc21-f290d7b12dee",
              #"urn:appian:record-action:v1:58275e5f-625f-4d0b-9b27-58f09b63e138/a347bcc5-ecd7-4182-8bc5-9bb90e76f3cf"
            },
            identifier: fv!identifier,
            style: "MENU_ICON",
            display: "LABEL_AND_ICON",
            accessibilityText: ""
          ),
          width: "ICON",
          showWhen: true
        )
      },
      pageSize: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_PAGE_SIZE_MEDIUM_LARGE,
      initialSorts: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
        field: recordType!AS GCM R Template.templateName,
        ascending: true
      ),
      emptyGridMessage: "",
      userFilters: {
        #"urn:appian:user-filter:v1:58275e5f-625f-4d0b-9b27-58f09b63e138/1923a98e-bd9e-4f99-a323-a6a5c26891d7"
      },
      validations: {},
      refreshAfter: "RECORD_ACTION",
      showSearchBox: true,
      showRefreshButton: true,
      showExportButton: true,
      recordActions: {
        rule!AS_GCM_CP_recordActionItem(
          action: #"urn:appian:record-action:v1:58275e5f-625f-4d0b-9b27-58f09b63e138/74632257-265f-46c5-9b09-698be9486eb2",
          identifier: null
        )
      },
      actionsDisplay: "LABEL_AND_ICON"
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e63a-a5cb-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetDetails

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_formatDateTime

_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName
_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!match(
  value: ri!colorName,
  /* White Colors */
  equals: "WHITE",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_WHITE,
  equals: "WHITE_2",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_WHITE_2,
  /* Gray Colors */
  equals: "GRAY_0",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_GRAY_0,
  equals: "GRAY_1",
  then: "#EDEDF2",
  equals: "GRAY_2",
  then: "#DCDCE5",
  equals: "GRAY_3",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_GRAY_3,
  equals: "GRAY_4",
  then: "#2E2E35",
  /* Orange Colors */
  equals: "ORANGE_1",
  then: "#FFEED3",
  equals: "ORANGE_2",
  then: "#FFDCA3",
  equals: "ORANGE_3",
  then: "#FAA92F",
  equals: "ORANGE_4",
  then: "#995C00",
  /* Blue Colors */
  equals: "BLUE_0",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_BLUE_0,
  equals: "BLUE_1",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_BLUE_1,
  equals: "BLUE_2",
  then: "#AFBFF8",
  equals: "BLUE_3",
  then: "#2322F0",
  equals: "BLUE_4",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_BLUE_4,
  equals: "BLUE_5",
  then: "#E9EDFC",
  equals: "BLUE_6",
  then: "#08088D",
  equals: "BLUE_7",
  then: "#DCDEF5",
  /* Green Colors  */
  equals: "GREEN_1",
  then: "#E3FBDF",
  equals: "GREEN_4",
  then: "#117C00",
  /* Teal Colors */
  equals: "TEAL_1",
  then: "#E2FAF9",
  equals: "TEAL_3",
  then: "#56ADC0",
  equals: "TEAL_4",
  then: "#2C6770",
  /* Purple Colors */
  equals: "PURPLE_1",
  then: "#F2E9FF",
  equals: "PURPLE_3",
  then: "#B561FF",
  equals: "PURPLE_4",
  then: "#790DA1",
  /* Red Colors */
  equals: "RED_4",
  then: "#9F0019",
  /* Yellow Colors */
  equals: "YELLOW_0",
  then: "#FFFCEB",
  equals: "YELLOW_1",
  then: "#FFF6C9",
  equals: "YELLOW_4",
  then: "#856C00",
  /* Appian Colors */
  equals: "APPIAN_BACKGROUND",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_APPIAN_BACKGROUND,
  equals: "ACCENT",
  then: "#2322f0",
  default: ri!colorName
)

_a-0000e8cc-c513-8000-9c0f-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_DPL_CO_UT_formatCurrencyValue

_a-0000e615-fd0f-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QNM_CPS_questionnaireSettings

_a-0000e63c-01b0-8000-9bb5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_FRM_getBrandingValueByKey
_a-0000e63c-01b0-8000-9bb5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!brandingConfigs: getbrandingconfig(ri!defaultBrandingConfigDoc, true),
  
  local!defaultValue: displayvalue(
    tostring(ri!brandingKey),
    touniformstring(local!brandingConfigs.defaultBranding.key),
    local!brandingConfigs.defaultBranding.value,
    null
  ),
  
  local!customValue: displayvalue(
    tostring(ri!brandingKey),
    touniformstring(local!brandingConfigs.customBranding.key),
    local!brandingConfigs.customBranding.value,
    null
  ),
  
  local!type: displayvalue(
    tostring(ri!brandingKey),
    touniformstring(local!brandingConfigs.defaultBranding.key),
    touniformstring(local!brandingConfigs.defaultBranding.type),
    null
  ),
  
  local!returnValue: if(
    isnull(local!customValue),
    local!defaultValue,
    local!customValue
  ),
  
  local!castReturnValue: if(
    contains({"IMAGE", "FAVICON"}, local!type),
    todocument(local!returnValue),
    local!returnValue
  ),
  
  local!castReturnValue
)

_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_queryRecordByIdentifier
_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*

PLEASE REFER TO THE BOTTOM OF THIS RULE FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO USE

Please DO NOT auto-format this rule

*/
a!localVariables(
  /*Determine the castResultToType*/
  local!castResultToType: a!defaultValue(ri!castToCdtType, ri!recordType),
  /*Execute the query*/
  local!queryResult: a!refreshVariable(
    value: if(
      ri!executeWhen = false,
      null(ri!recordType),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordByIdentifier"(
        recordType: ri!recordType,
        identifier: ri!identifier,
        fields: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
          {
            ri!fields,
            index(
              ri!relatedRecordData,
              "relationship",
              null
            )
          }
        ),
        relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
      )
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh,
    refreshInterval: ri!refreshInterval,
    refreshAfter: { "RECORD_ACTION" }
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: local!castResultToType,
    value: local!queryResult
  )
)/*

DOCUMENTATION

This rule is designed to minimize the overhead with querying data and then casting the result


Required Inputs:

1. recordType
- This is a recordtype! input of the data type to be queried against

2. identifier
- The primary key of the record type which needs to be queried

Optional Inputs:

3. executeWhen
- The query will not execute if this is false, the query will execute if this is true or null
-- This is meant to operate in a similar manner to the showWhen parameter of components
- Use this to skip execution of a query without needing to wrap if() statements around the rule
-- Examples of this would be to skip querying if your filter value is a null ID
- If the query does not execute, this will return a null value whose type is based on the returnType input

4. triggerRefresh
- By default, the query will always re-execute whenever any inputs change
- However, by updating the value of triggerRefresh, you can also trigger a re-execution even if none of the other inputs change (e.g. after a record action)

5. castToCdtType
- Any cdt type to the cast the result set. 

6. fields
- The record fields that need to be queried

7. relatedRecordData
- the relatedRecordData in which the filters and limit can be specified for each relationship

*/

_a-0000e615-fd0f-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QNM_GRD_questionsForQuestionBank
AS_GCM_GRD_clausesGrid
_a-0000e615-fd0f-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridField_v3"(
  label: "",
  labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
  data: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordData"(
    recordType: recordType!AS GCM R Clause,
    filters: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.isActive,
      operator: "=",
      value: true(),
      applyWhen: rule!AS_GCM_DPL_CO_UT_isUserMemberOfGroups(
        groups: cons!AS_GCM_GRP_CONTRACTING_PERSONNEL,
        user: loggedInUser()
      )
    )
  ),
  rowHeader: if(
    rule!AS_GCM_DPL_CO_UT_isUserMemberOfGroups(
      groups: cons!AS_GCM_GRP_CONTRACTING_PERSONNEL,
      user: loggedInUser()
    ),
    1,
    2
  ),
  emptyGridMessage: "",
  columns: {
    rule!AS_GCM_UI_refClauseTitleGridColumn(
      bundle: ri!bundle,
      linkShowWhen: true,
      showTruncatedClauseTitle: true
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "UCF Section",
      sortField: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.ucfSection.sectionLabel,
      value: a!defaultValue(
        value: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM R Clause.ucfSection.sectionLabel],
        default: "-"
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "",
      sortField: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.prescriptionNumber,
      value: a!defaultValue(
        value: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM R Clause.prescriptionNumber],
        default: "-"
      ),
      align: "END",
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "",
      sortField: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.isActive,
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_tagField"(
        tags: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_tagItem_v1"(
          text: rule!AS_GCM_DSP_clauseStatus(
            isActive: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM R Clause.isActive],
            bundle: ri!bundle
          ),
          backgroundColor: if(
            fv!row[recordType!AS GCM R Clause.isActive],
            rule!AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName(colorName: "GREEN_1"),
            rule!AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName(colorName: "GRAY_1")
          ),
          textColor: if(
            fv!row[recordType!AS GCM R Clause.isActive],
            rule!AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName(colorName: "GREEN_4"),
            rule!AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName(colorName: "GRAY_4")
          )
        )
      ),
      showWhen: not(
        rule!AS_GCM_DPL_CO_UT_isUserMemberOfGroups(
          groups: cons!AS_GCM_GRP_CONTRACTING_PERSONNEL,
          user: loggedInUser()
        )
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "",
      sortField: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.modifiedDatetime,
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_formatDateTime(
        dateTime: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM R Clause.modifiedDatetime]
      ),
      align: "END",
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "",
      sortField: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.syncUpdatedDatetime,
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_formatDateTime(
        dateTime: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM R Clause.syncUpdatedDatetime]
      ),
      align: "END",
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "",
      value: rule!AS_GCM_CP_recordActionField(
        actions: {
          #"urn:appian:record-action:v1:83b74fc4-71d0-456a-8b20-12ea04b76cd1/1cc136ac-fbf0-4f57-bd28-c469eaef20f0"
        },
        style: "MENU_ICON",
        display: "LABEL_AND_ICON",
        accessibilityText: "",
        identifier: fv!identifier
      ),
      showWhen: or(
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
          items: index(
            fv!currentPage.data,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.clauseId,
            null()
          ),
          expression: rule!AS_GAM_getRecordActionVisibility(
            action: #"urn:appian:record-action:v1:83b74fc4-71d0-456a-8b20-12ea04b76cd1/1cc136ac-fbf0-4f57-bd28-c469eaef20f0",
            identifier: fv!item
          )
        )
      ),
      width: "ICON"
    )
  },
  pageSize: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_PAGE_SIZE_MEDIUM,
  initialSorts: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
    field: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.isActive
  ),
  secondarySorts: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
      field: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.clauseNumber,
      ascending: true
    )
  },
  borderStyle: "LIGHT",
  shadeAlternateRows: false,
  refreshAfter: "RECORD_ACTION",
  userFilters: {
    if(
      not(
        rule!AS_GCM_DPL_CO_UT_isUserMemberOfGroups(
          groups: cons!AS_GCM_GRP_CONTRACTING_PERSONNEL,
          user: loggedInUser()
        )
      ),
      #"urn:appian:user-filter:v1:83b74fc4-71d0-456a-8b20-12ea04b76cd1/f94d8c3c-9506-4b7e-8a0a-b73b53baf2e6",
      {}
    ),
    #"urn:appian:user-filter:v1:83b74fc4-71d0-456a-8b20-12ea04b76cd1/72b58b53-ced9-4027-afa2-5946c8a16f3e",
    #"urn:appian:user-filter:v1:83b74fc4-71d0-456a-8b20-12ea04b76cd1/4b4bc120-45e6-45cf-962b-ddf5431b5fb8"
  },
  showSearchBox: true,
  showRefreshButton: true,
  showExportButton: true,
  recordActions: {
    rule!AS_GCM_CP_recordActionItem(
      action: #"urn:appian:record-action:v1:83b74fc4-71d0-456a-8b20-12ea04b76cd1/d40ccfd6-24a3-43b2-9aa6-567f3e208b68"
    )
  }
)

_a-0000e61a-f20f-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CO_DSP_primaryRecordListField

)

_a-0000e3c8-6861-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_triggerRefresh
_a-0000e3c8-6861-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*

Use this rule in any saveInto to update the value of a local variable triggerRefresh.

It should be used in conjunction with a local variable configured to refresh
whenever this rule is executed. To configure the local variable you intend to refresh,
set it up like this:

a!localVariables(
  local!triggerRefresh: now(),

  local!data: a!refreshVariable(
    value: ..(value definition)..,
    refreshOnVarChange: local!triggerRefresh
  )
)

*/

a!save(
  ri!triggerRefresh,
  now()
)

_a-0000e615-fd0f-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QNM_GRD_Template_Questionnaire
_a-0000e615-fd0f-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!triggerRefresh: a!refreshVariable(
    value: now(),
    refreshAfter: "RECORD_ACTION",
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!refreshOnVarChange
  ),
  local!questionnaireTemplateId: a!refreshVariable(
    value: null,
    refreshAfter: "RECORD_ACTION"
  ),
  local!selectedQuestionnaireTemplate: rule!AS_GCM_QNM_QR_getQuestionnaire_Template(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT,
    getAllRelatedRecord: true(),
    questionnaireTemplateId: local!questionnaireTemplateId,
    executeWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(local!questionnaireTemplateId),
    triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh
  ),
  local!questionnaireExistsInRule: tointeger(
    index(
      local!selectedQuestionnaireTemplate,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.numOfQuestionsAssociatedWithRuleConditions,
      0
    )
  ) > 0,
  {
    {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideLayout"(
        items: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
            item: rule!AS_GCM_CP_recordActionField(
              actions: #"urn:appian:record-action:v1:9f80ae61-036a-46c1-8975-aebefe443c6e/25f6f279-3c5c-43e8-b265-a8cdf0320481",
              identifier: local!selectedQuestionnaireTemplate[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.questionnaireTemplateId]
            ),
            width: "MINIMIZE"
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
            item: if(
              or(
                local!questionnaireExistsInRule,
                rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
                  local!selectedQuestionnaireTemplate[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.questionnaireTemplateId]
                )
              ),
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonArrayLayout"(
                buttons: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"(
                  label: "",
                  icon: "trash-o",
                  tooltip: if(
                    local!questionnaireExistsInRule,
                    "",
                    {}
                  ),
                  size: "SMALL",
                  color: "SECONDARY",
                  disabled: true()
                ),
                align: "START",
                marginBelow: "NONE"
              ),
              rule!AS_GCM_CP_recordActionField(
                actions: #"urn:appian:record-action:v1:9f80ae61-036a-46c1-8975-aebefe443c6e/df4a006a-08b6-4f47-9277-af019dadd4a2",
                identifier: local!selectedQuestionnaireTemplate[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.questionnaireTemplateId]
              )
            ),
            width: "MINIMIZE"
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
            item: if(
              rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
                local!selectedQuestionnaireTemplate[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.questionnaireTemplateId]
              ),
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonArrayLayout"(
                buttons: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"(
                  label: "",
                  icon: "star",
                  size: "SMALL",
                  color: "SECONDARY",
                  disabled: true()
                ),
                align: "START",
                marginBelow: "NONE"
              ),
              rule!AS_GCM_CP_recordActionField(
                actions: #"urn:appian:record-action:v1:9f80ae61-036a-46c1-8975-aebefe443c6e/c403c132-66e4-4b09-aed2-ee62d86e02e2",
                identifier: local!selectedQuestionnaireTemplate[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.questionnaireTemplateId]
              )
            ),
            width: "MINIMIZE"
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
            item: if(
              rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
                local!selectedQuestionnaireTemplate[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.questionnaireTemplateId]
              ),
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonArrayLayout"(
                buttons: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"(
                  label: "",
                  icon: "files-o",
                  size: "SMALL",
                  color: "SECONDARY",
                  disabled: true()
                ),
                align: "START",
                marginBelow: "NONE"
              ),
              rule!AS_GCM_CP_recordActionField(
                actions: #"urn:appian:record-action:v1:9f80ae61-036a-46c1-8975-aebefe443c6e/92556ae5-7cb7-4153-8e03-2c069b7f94b3",
                identifier: local!selectedQuestionnaireTemplate[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.questionnaireTemplateId]
              )
            ),
            width: "MINIMIZE"
          )
        },
        alignVertical: "MIDDLE",
        spacing: "DENSE"
      ),
      rule!AS_GCM_QNM_GRD_questionnaireTemplates(
        bundle: ri!bundle,
        triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh,
        selectedQuestionnaireTemplateId: local!questionnaireTemplateId
      )
    }
  }
)

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_displayValue
_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
displayvalue(
  
  ri!value,
  
  ri!inArray,
  
  ri!replacement,
  
  if(
    
    ri!firstIsDefault,
    ri!replacement[1],
    
    ri!lastIsDefault,
    ri!replacement[count(ri!replacement)],
    
    ri!customDefault
  )
)

_a-0000e447-933d-8000-9baa-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_questionMetadata

_a-0000e63a-a5cb-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QE_getRefClauseAudits
_a-0000e63a-a5cb-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GCM_ENT_R_A_R_CLAUSE,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_R_A_R_Clause',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!clauseId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "clauseId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!clauseId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "auditActionCode",
      operator: "<>",
      value: cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_UNCHANGED
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  sort: ri!sort
)

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_DSP_removeIcon

_a-0000edca-8e92-8000-9e0b-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CRD_Clauses_GenerateClauseUsageReport

_a-0000e4b1-2fbc-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QNM_GRD_questionnaireTemplates
_a-0000e4b1-2fbc-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridField_v3"(
  label: "",
  labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
  emptyGridMessage: "",
  data: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordData"(
    recordType: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire,
    filters: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.isActive,
      operator: "=",
      value: true()
    )
  ),
  columns: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "",
      sortField: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.name,
      value: rule!AS_GCM_CP_recordActionField(
        actions: #"urn:appian:record-action:v1:9f80ae61-036a-46c1-8975-aebefe443c6e/d8ca77c6-d140-4614-88a5-0d6251c810f9",
        display: "LABEL",
        style: "LINKS",
        identifier: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.questionnaireTemplateId],
        openActionsIn: "DIALOG"
      ),
      width: "AUTO"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "",
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
        value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
          icon: "star",
          color: "ACCENT",
          showWhen: a!localVariables(
            local!showWhen: a!refreshVariable(
              value: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.questionnaireTemplateId] = cons!AS_GCM_QNM_INT_DEFAULT_QUESTIONNAIRE_TEMPLATE_ID,
              refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh
            ),
            local!showWhen
          ),
          altText: "Default Questionnaire"
        )
      ),
      align: "CENTER",
      width: "NARROW"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "",
      sortField: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.description,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.description],
      width: "WIDE"
    ),
    /*MAPPINGFIELD grid columns removed*/
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Date Created",
      sortField: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.createdDatetime,
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
        value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
          text: rule!AS_CO_UT_formatDate(
            date: rule!AS_CO_UT_convertDateTimeToDate(
              dateTime: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.createdDatetime]
            )
          )
        )
      ),
      width: "NARROW_PLUS",
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Last modified",
      sortField: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.modifiedDatetime,
      value: rule!AS_CO_DSP_displayTimeByUser(
        user: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.modifiedBy],
        datetime: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.modifiedDatetime]
      ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "",
      value: rule!AS_GCM_CP_recordActionField(
        actions: {
          #"urn:appian:record-action:v1:9f80ae61-036a-46c1-8975-aebefe443c6e/af99eaa9-1301-4814-abc5-3ec0bfe99e08"
        },
        identifier: fv!identifier,
        style: "MENU_ICON",
        display: "LABEL_AND_ICON",
        accessibilityText: "View History"
      ),
      width: "ICON",
      showWhen: true
    )
  },
  pageSize: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_PAGE_SIZE_LARGE,
  initialSorts: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
    field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.modifiedDatetime,
    ascending: false
  ),
  secondarySorts: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
    field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.name,
    ascending: true
  ),
  showWhen: ri!showWhen,
  selectable: true,
  selectionValue: ri!selectedQuestionnaireTemplateId,
  selectionSaveInto: {
    a!save(
      ri!selectedQuestionnaireTemplateId,
      fv!selectedRows[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.questionnaireTemplateId]
    ),
    rule!AS_CO_UT_triggerRefresh(triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh)
  },
  showSearchBox: false(),
  showRefreshButton: false(),
  refreshAfter: "RECORD_ACTION",
  rowHeader: 1
)
